item.title: Nexstar and Sinclair are bringing back Kimmel, but many viewers may have found alternatives while he was blacked out
item.description: Experts say blackouts can push viewers to streaming services, potentially undermining a boycott altogether.

item.title: Trump’s TikTok deal won’t cut off China’s algorithm, but it could give a lot of people a big payout
item.description: The deal Trump says will create a new, 'safe' TikTok for American users appears to hinge on an unusual solution to the social media app's algorithm.

item.title: Musk, Thiel, and Bannon appear in newly released Epstein records, years after sex-offender plea
item.description: The schedules show high-profile names penciled in for lunches, flights, and island trips.

item.title: All bark, no bite: Trump’s latest trade war turns into another TACO salad for Wall Street
item.description: Markets actually improved on the latest surprise round of Trump tariffs.

item.title: Wall Street snaps 3-day losing streak on moderate inflation report
item.description: Stocks got some help from a report showing that inflation in the U.S. accelerated to 2.7%, precisely what economists had projected.
